statements: DELETE FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_id = 100 AND expression_level < 5.0;

DELETE FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_id = 100 AND expression_level < 0.5;
DELETE FROM experimental_metadata WHERE lab_location = 'Lab A' AND researcher_name = 'John Doe' AND experiment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM experimental_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM sample WHERE sample_name = 'Sample_A' AND sample_type = 'Type_A';
